column4: I just got back from resetting my system and... I think whoever said the crashes might be related to flash I think they were right
Although.. I can't have my browser crashing everytime I go on a site that uses flash
That's not good.. did you install flash?
Well all I can suggest is to remove flashplugin-nonfree package for now and see how things go. Some sites like youtube are leaning toward html5 these days
